intro: I help small to organizations build reliable, scalable infrastructure through cloud architecture, automation, and DevOps practices.

services.title: Cloud Architecture
services.description: Design and implement resilient, scalable systems on AWS and other cloud platforms.

services.title: Infrastructure as Code
services.description: Implement Ansible, Terraform, and Packer for reproducible, version-controlled deployments.

services.title: Legacy Modernization
services.description: Migrate on-premise applications to cloud environments with minimal disruption.

services.title: CI/CD & Automation
services.description: Build deployment pipelines, configuration management, and workflow automation.

projects.description: Migrated legacy LAPP applications from bare metal Linode servers to AWS with resilient, scalable architecture codified with Ansible. Deployed 15 EC2 instances with auto-scaling and load balancers, transitioned 5 databases to AWS RDS, and deployed 12 applications across 18 Ansible roles.
projects.technologies: Ubuntu, AWS (EC2, ASG, ALB, IAM, S3, RDS, VPC), PostgreSQL, Ansible

projects.description: Created complete infrastructure on AWS one month before developers started work for B2B apparel sourcing platform. Established Jenkins CI, RabbitMQ messaging, Redis caching, and CloudFront CDN across 4 environments using 8 Ansible roles and 9 Packer configs.
projects.technologies: Ubuntu, Vagrant, Ansible, Terraform, Packer, Jenkins, Docker, Nginx, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, AWS

projects.description: Enhanced resilience, security, and automation for fashion rental company. Hardened SSH security, reduced costs through capacity optimization of 7 EC2 c3.xlarge instances, improved CI workflows with Codeship and Capistrano, and enhanced monitoring with Datadog and Elasticsearch.
projects.technologies: Ubuntu, Git, Codeship, Capistrano, Redis, Cloudflare, Datadog, Elasticsearch, Nginx, PostgreSQL, Ansible, Terraform, AWS

projects.description: Migrated analytics infrastructure from on-premise SQL Server to AWS Redshift 6-node dc2.large cluster handling 50M+ rows/day. Containerized Talend ELT jobs on 2 AWS ECS clusters, deployed Vue.js/Django project with Redis and Aurora MySQL, and executed zero-downtime HTTP-to-HTTPS migration.
projects.technologies: Ubuntu, Docker, Nginx, Gitlab CI, AWS (ECS, Redshift, RDS, S3, ElastiCache, ALB, VPC)

projects.description: Transformed journalism platform from basic AWS Lightsail to resilient, multi-region infrastructure using Terraform, Ansible, and Packer. Deployed 15 EC2 instances supporting ~20 deployments per day, replicated across 3 environments and 2 AWS regions, with automated nightly destruction and morning redeployment, secured with Cloudflare.
projects.technologies: Ubuntu, Ansible, Packer, Terraform, Gitlab CI, Docker, Cloudflare, AWS (EC2, ECS, ASG, S3, RDS, VPC, SNS)
